aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.subtitle: We build tailor-made it solutions for our clients.
aboutUs.text1: Shine Consulting Services LTD is a startup launched in 2016. We work with clients in France.
aboutUs.text2: Our company is organised on a human scale and we want to keep it this way so that we continue to work in a flexible, agile and innovative way.
aboutUs.text3: We are convinced that a good work environment and happy workers is one of the keys to success. It is very important for us that our people engage with us on the long run. We are a team composed of experimented and young, dynamic and very motivated resources.
aboutUs.text4: Our goal is to create a trust relashionship with our clients and to work on the long run with them. To do this we convey these values :

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We design the best possible solutions for you.

webSite.title: Web site
webSite.text: We develop web sites using the latest technologies. Our solutions are modern, flexible, responsive, cross-browser compatible and at a very competitive rate.

webApplications.title: Applications
webApplications.text: We build solutions adapted to your business. Our leitmotiv is quality, automation, modularity, innovation and respect of the deadlines.

resources.title: Resource Outsourcing
resources.text: Our resources are bilingual (english and french), competent and very dedicated. We also favor a close follow up of the activities by the most experienced members.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact us by mail or telephone. We will be happy to give us more details about our company and our services.
contact.sendMessageText: Please fill all the required information. We will reply to you as soon as we get your message.

process.title: Process
process.text: We follow a 7-step process to garantee quality solutions :

textBullet.informationGathering: Gathering Information: Purpose, main goals, and target audience
textBullet.design: Design: Page layouts, review and approval cycle
textBullet.maintainance: Maintenance: Opinion monitoring and regular updating

endProduct.title: End product
endProduct.text: We are dedicated to build your website with the following requirements :

textBullet.responsive: Responsive website (adaptabillity to different screen sizes and types : mobile, tablet, laptop and screen)

development.title: Mobile or web application development
development.text1: We develop native mobile applications for IOS and Android or cross-platform (hybrid) applications.
development.text2: Our web solutions follow a 3-tier architecture with a responsive and cross-browser frontend.
development.text3: The applications are developed in an agile way with the goal to :

textBullet.deadline: We have experimented resources who do the estimations and plannings. We make sure that the deadlines are respected.
textBullet.technologyChoose: Our solutions are demand driven and not technology driven. We have expertise in many technologies and will choose the best technology for your requirements.
textBullet.automation: Beyond developping your application, we will see if we can help you optimise and automate your process.
textBullet.innovation: We are at the cutting edge of technology and will make you benefit from the latest innovations.
textBullet.flexibillity: Our solutions are flexible, easily upgradeable and scalable.

resource.text1: We assist you to succeed your projects with our expertise in development, testing, support and project management.
resource.text2: We provide you with resources that best fit your project requirements.
resource.text3: Our resources are well-formed, competent, very dedicated and have the following skills and technical expertise.

textBullet.technology: At the cutting edge of technology

textBullet.frontend: Frontend HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript/Typescript including frameworks Angular and Jquery
